transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello. Haan ji?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji, kaun kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji sir, ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Aapka naam kya hai, aap kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Kya bol rahe hain sir?
Executive: Bhai Shubham ji, kaun baat kar rahe hain, apna naam nahi batayenge aap IndiaMART se hain toh? Aapne call kis kara hai, apna naam batayenge apna?
Customer: Sir, main Shubham baat kar raha hun. Ji aap kaun baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Ji haan, theek hai, theek hai. Main customer baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ka. Mera account hai Soheb Saifi ke naam se.
Executive: Sir company ka naam kya hai?
Customer: Diamond Rapid.
Customer: Haan ji, Diamond Rapid.
Executive: Kya naam hai?
Customer: Diamond Rapid se baat kar raha hun main.
Executive: Ji. Ek second rukiye sir.
Executive: Diamond kya bolte, ek second rukiye.
Executive: Ek baar aap apna registered number bataiye sir, kaun se number se registered hai please?
Customer: 9654
Customer: 9654
Customer: 842019
Executive: Haan ji Diamond Rapid sir, please bataiye.
Customer: Main actually hamara jo hamara jo matlab kaam hai optical display ka hai. Abhi koi Mr. Harish hain jo hamare as a manager hain. Theek hai IndiaMART mein hame batate hain jo bhi woh hoti hai dikkat abhi kuch dino se.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, pehle Yogendra hoga.
Customer: Pehle Yogendra the, right. Toh abhi Harish hain. Lekin mere paas buyleads nahi aa rahi hain. Bilkul mere paas kaam nahi aa raha hai. Woh upar se call pick nahi karte hain.
Customer: Woh busy rehte hain. Bar bar ek hi baat bol dete hain, patience rakhiye, patience rakhiye. Kitna patience rakhun main? Kitna nahi ja raha apna mujhe bataiye aap.
Customer: Main iska paisa pay kar raha hun. Haan, theek hai na main isme main star supplier ka paisa pay kar raha hun. Aur kitne din mere aise waste ho chuke hain. Aur jo abhi aage mera plan khatam ho jayega shayad mere khyal se March mein khatam hoga mera plan khatam hoga. Ek din mein hi woh log buyleads dena band kar denge. Theek hai na? Yahi hoga na?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Lekin ab ab aap bhi caller hain. Mujhe kisi aapke kisi senior se aap mujhe bataiye kya ho sakta hai. Mujhe bataiye kya ho sakta hai. Mere paas kaam nahi aa raha hai, bilkul bhi kaam nahi aa raha hai mere paas.
Executive: A Soheb ji, mera naam Shubham hai sir. Aur Harish jo hai basically uski jagah mere ko appoint kiya gaya hai. Harish abhi company mein nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi abhi toh unse baat hui woh keh rahe hain ki jo hai haan patience rakhiye.
Customer: Woh toh unhe mana karna chahiye na is cheez ke bare mein. Unhe kuch pata hi nahi hai unhe.
Executive: Main baat dekh leta hun. Dusra kya hai ki Yogendra bhi nahi hai. Yogendra ka toh aapko pata chal gaya hoga shayad.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Main ek baar ek toh yeh dekh leta hun ki Harish se ek baar baat kar leta hun. Pura woh dekh leta hun ki idhar matter kya hai, sari cheeze samajh leta hun. Kis tarike ki leads aa rahi hain. Issue kya aa raha hai thoda sa batayenge sir leads mein issue hai ya kaisa kya leads nahi aa rahi hain.
Customer: Meri baat suniye, sabse pehla first of all pehla jo issue hai woh yahi hai ki mere paas leads nahi aa rahi hain. Dusra issue yeh hai ki maine bola tha acrylics ki lagatar acrylics ki sheets aa rahi hain. Teesra issue yeh hai ki upar mention hota hai optical display ke niche quantity ki requirement hai suddenly hum call karte hain haan ji.
Executive: Main na ek kaam kariye main aapko na ek second call pe rukiye main aapko woh laga raha hun. Main apne number se call laga raha hun. Isme aawaz thodi kat rahi hai. Aapne lag raha hai customer care pe call kiya hai na?
Customer: Ji ji main aapko laga raha hun. Ek second rukiye main mera number bata raha hun. Isi number pe isi number pe call kijiyega jis number se maine kiya hai.
Executive: Yahi yahi wala hai na sir 019 wala last mein?
Customer: Haan ji. Nahi nahi yeh wala nahi hai. Main dusre se call kar raha hun. 79822. Haan ji haan ji. 447 haan laga raha hun sir aap.
Executive: Ji ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads.

- Receiving irrelevant leads (acrylic sheets).

- Call not picked up by the team.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that Harish is no longer with company.

- Executive assured to look into the matter.

- Executive will call back from personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back from personal number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant leads, support, executive change
